de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery.base
Interface ILLGallery

All Known Implementing Classes:
LLAsyncGallery, LLGallery
public interface ILLGallery

Provides generic interface for a LLGallery.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chris Xinyue Zhao

Method Detail

setImages

void setImages(java.util.List<Bitmap> _bitmaps)
Set item source.

  • Not all source will be shown. Because some items haven't been loaded yet(Internet, resource...etc).

    Parameters:
    _bitmaps - the data source
    Since:
    1.0

    • setImages

    void setImages(java.util.List<Bitmap> _bitmaps,
               int _maxWidth)
    Set item source.

  • Not all data source will be shown. Because some items haven't been loaded yet(Internet, resource...etc).

    Parameters:
    _bitmaps - the data source
    _maxWidth - the max-width that each item can be shown.
    Since:
    1.0

                 int _maxWidth,
                 java.lang.String _comment)
    Append an item. Like setImages(List, int) the LLGallery shows the item with associated _maxWidth.

    Parameters:

    _maxWidth - the max width

    • addComments

    void addComments(int _commentViewId,
                 java.lang.String[] _comments)
    Add an array of comments to describe each item.

  • If the per-loaded items are null, the correspond comment will be null.

    Parameters:
    _commentViewId - the ID of View places comments
    _comments - the array of comments
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    #setImages(List)}, #setImages(List, int)}

    • addComments

    void addComments(int _commentViewId,
                 LLGallery.CommentPosition _pos,
                 java.lang.String[] _comments)
    Add an array of comments to describe each item.

  • If the per-loaded items are null, the correspond comment will be null.

    Parameters:
    _commentViewId - the ID of View places comments
    _pos - where is the comment LLGallery.CommentPosition
    _comments - the array of comments
    Since:
    1.0
